itemDescription: English amateur cricketer and Conservative Party politician (1812-1881)

wikipedia_page.main: The Honourable Edward Harbottle Grimston (born 2 April 1812 at Mayfair, London; died 4 May 1881 at Pebmarsh, Essex) was an English amateur cricketer and a Conservative Party politician who held a seat in the House of Commons from 1835 to 1841.
